name: Lava Pit
description:
** NEW LOGOS AND BANNERS COMING SOON**

This is my first "Finished" game made with Unity. I use Photon for the multiplayer aspect of the game.

This very game is inspired by the Minecraft game mode Spleef. I wanted to create a fun game that people could enjoy! So here it is. Mechanically, its pretty much finished but I need to add more maps for the bigger game modes, more polishing etc.

Features:

- Online PvP (Currently 1v1 Only)

- Unlockable Characters (In The Works)

- Multiple Maps (In the works)

I do plan to continue development of this game, I just wanted to submit it a little early so I could get some important feedback of you, the player!

Thank you and I hope you enjoy.
